column1: the place where the deceased was lying, held him by his hair and stabbed
the deceased in his chest twice with a dagger. Allegedly the 4th or the 5th
accused has had in his possession a knife. The accused who had a knife
in his possession  had tried to stab PW-03 with it. However, PW-01 has
placed herself in between the two preventing PW-03 from being injured,
the deceased has succumbed to the injuries later.
